channel.title: Portfowarding
channel.description: Ok i have created no-ip set all that up correctly went to firewal and allowed the correct tcp and udp port. I go to my speedstream router manangement and create a new portfowarding configuration and it only allows me to pick one of the two (tcp or udp) i pick tcp and add my ip and save and my server wont come online

item.title: Portfowarding
item.dc:creator: @grvzdavdubz grvzdavdubz
item.description:
@grvzdavdubz wrote:

[quote=“fleminmj01, post:4, topic:409388”]is it that other people cant connect or that you cant connect using the no-ip because other people may be able to connect so you ca put your cliient ip to 0.0.0.0

hope this is the issue you have

sorry if it didnt help[/quote]

Because i couldnt read his topic to well (sorry, not a good flow) You might have your client still set to 0.0.0.0. while other players try to connect, they will connected to 0.0.0.0 instead of XXXXXXXX.no-ip.org. Check the client you released. If you need help changing the ip, pm me

Read full topic
